players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "I investigated Bob last night and he is the mafioso. We must vote him out today."
You: "Diana is lying! Why would a real detective reveal themselves so early and make themselves a target? This is a desperate mafia play."
Charlie: "Diana, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Bob and not the mafioso's obvious first target?"
Charlie: "Diana, if you're the detective, you just made yourself the next kill. But if you're lying, you're mafia. Either way, we vote Diana today to test her claim."
You: "Charlie makes an excellent point - a real detective would never expose themselves this early. Diana is clearly the mafia trying to frame me before she gets caught!"
Diana: "I am the detective. I investigated Bob and he is mafia. Charlie, if you vote me out, you're handing the game to Bob. Trust me."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Diana was arrested
